short_term_goals.learning_outcomes: Gain proficiency in core machine learning algorithms, techniques, and tools such as Python, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, and Pandas.
short_term_goals.specific: Complete a comprehensive online course or tutorial series on machine learning fundamentals, covering topics like supervised and unsupervised learning, regression, classification, clustering, and neural networks.
short_term_goals.measurable: Achieve a score of at least 85% on the course assessments and be able to implement basic machine learning models using the covered tools and libraries.
short_term_goals.achievable: Leverage my existing programming skills in Python and familiarity with data manipulation libraries to quickly learn and apply machine learning concepts.
short_term_goals.relevant: This goal will provide the necessary foundation and skills to start working on more complex machine learning projects.
short_term_goals.time_bound: Complete the course within the first 3 months of the 2-year timeline.

short_term_goals.learning_outcomes: Develop expertise in building and deploying end-to-end machine learning pipelines, from data preprocessing to model training, evaluation, and deployment.
short_term_goals.specific: Work on a personal project that involves collecting and preprocessing a dataset, training a machine learning model, and deploying it as a web application or API.
short_term_goals.measurable: Successfully complete the project, including the deployment of the model, and document the process in a portfolio piece.
short_term_goals.achievable: Leverage the machine learning fundamentals learned in the previous goal, as well as my existing web development skills in technologies like Django and React.
short_term_goals.relevant: This project will demonstrate my ability to apply machine learning in a practical, end-to-end scenario, which is a key requirement for the target role.
short_term_goals.time_bound: Complete the project within the first 6 months of the 2-year timeline.

short_term_goals.learning_outcomes: Gain experience in working with large-scale, distributed data processing and machine learning systems.
short_term_goals.specific: Participate in an open-source machine learning project that involves working with big data technologies like Apache Spark, Hadoop, or Kafka.
short_term_goals.measurable: Contribute to the project by implementing data pipelines, training distributed machine learning models, and deploying the solution to a cloud platform.
short_term_goals.achievable: Leverage my existing knowledge of distributed systems and cloud technologies, as well as the machine learning skills developed in the previous goals.
short_term_goals.relevant: This experience will help me develop the skills needed to work with large-scale, production-ready machine learning systems, which is a key requirement for the target role.
short_term_goals.time_bound: Contribute to the open-source project for at least 6 months within the 2-year timeline.

short_term_goals.learning_outcomes: Gain practical experience in applying machine learning to solve real-world problems in a professional setting.
short_term_goals.specific: Secure an internship or part-time position at a company or organization that utilizes machine learning, and work on a machine learning project as part of the role.
short_term_goals.measurable: Successfully complete the project, demonstrate the impact of the machine learning solution, and receive positive feedback from the employer.
short_term_goals.achievable: Leverage the skills and experience gained from the previous goals, as well as my existing professional experience, to secure a relevant position.
short_term_goals.relevant: This hands-on experience in a professional setting will help me develop a deeper understanding of the practical challenges and best practices in machine learning engineering.
short_term_goals.time_bound: Secure and complete the internship or part-time position within the last 6 months of the 2-year timeline.

short_term_goals.learning_outcomes: Demonstrate proficiency in machine learning engineering by completing a capstone project that showcases my skills and knowledge.
short_term_goals.specific: Design and implement a complex machine learning project that addresses a real-world problem, such as building a predictive model for a business use case or developing a novel machine learning algorithm.
short_term_goals.measurable: Successfully complete the project, including the deployment of the solution, and present the project in a portfolio or at a relevant conference or meetup.
short_term_goals.achievable: Leverage the skills and experience gained from the previous goals to tackle a more advanced machine learning project.
short_term_goals.relevant: This capstone project will serve as a culmination of my learning journey and demonstrate my readiness to take on the role of a machine learning engineer.
short_term_goals.time_bound: Complete the capstone project within the last 3 months of the 2-year timeline.
